definitions.definition: A piece of work that has been given much critical praise , especially one that is considered the greatest work of a person 's career .
A work of outstanding creativity , skill or workmanship .
examples: Masterpieces are not completed, they are abandoned.

definitions.definition: A work created in order to qualify as a master craftsman and member of a guild .

main_definition: A piece of work that has been given much critical praise , especially one that is considered the greatest work of a person 's career .
secondary_definitions: A work of outstanding creativity , skill or workmanship .
A work created in order to qualify as a master craftsman and member of a guild .
